price: Do not let their words grieve you. Surely We know what they conceal and what they reveal.
arabic: فَلَا يَحۡزُنكَ قَوۡلُهُمۡۘ إِنَّا نَعۡلَمُ مَا يُسِرُّونَ وَمَا يُعۡلِنُونَ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
